about_the_game:
Hell Miners is an exhilarating 2D platformer roguelite, originally designed for mobile gaming, now fully optimized for PC! Master drag-and-release mechanics to scale to treacherous heights, and dodge deadly traps. As you venture through the underworld, collect gold to enhance your gear and abilities. Dodge or defeat fierce monsters as you ascend with your gold and gains. Can you survive the infernal challenges and make your grand escape from Hell?



Harness the power of precision with our mobile click-and-drag mechanic, now built for PC. Strategically propel your character to eye-watering heights, navigating through treacherous obstacles with finesse. Every click counts as you aim to escape Hell, not just for survival but for all the riches that await. Climb higher, earn more scores, and secure your spot among the elite on the top 10 leaderboard. Reach for the heavens and leave your mark in Hell Miners!



Prepare to face the wrath of Hell's inhabitants as you journey through the underworld. Encounter a myriad of monstrous adversaries, each with their own unique abilities and challenges. From sinister demons to relentless spectres, every foe poses a formidable threat to your escape. Adapt your strategy, hone your reflexes, and unleash your skills to overcome these nightmarish foes. Will you emerge victorious against the terrors that lurk in the depths of Hell?



Gather gold as you traverse the perilous depths of Hell, unlocking a plethora of valuable items to aid in your ascent. Enhance your gear and abilities with a diverse array of upgrades, from enchanted weapons to mystical artefacts. Strengthen your defences, amplify your attacks, and unleash devastating powers upon your adversaries. With each run, amass wealth and invest wisely to bolster your chances of success. Forge your path to victory with the riches of the underworld in your grasp.
